item.title: Understand the pipeline
item.description: 1 - Introduction The RStudio environment includes templates of R Markdown documents proposing at selection step to chose PDF output format. It is then easy to render the document, actually simple as a click. How to start a PDF in RStudio: (1) File > New File > RMarkdown … > Select output PDF and OK; (2) click the knit button at the top of the source pane.
